#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define M 1000000007
long long  ex(long long  a,long long  n){
	if(n==0) return 1;
	else if(n==1) return a;
	else if(n%2==0) return ex((a*a)%M,n/2);
	else return (a*ex((a*a)%M,(n-1)/2))%M;
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long long  n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		long long  k = m%M;
		if(n==1){
			cout<<k<<"\n";
			continue;
		}
		if(n==2){
			k = (m*(m-1))%M;
			cout<<k<<"\n";
			continue;
		}
		k = (m*(m-1))%M;
		long long l = ex(m-2,n-2);
		l = (l*(k))%M;
		cout<<l<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
